summary: Backend bug fixes for SMTP and WhatsApp integrations verified - Both endpoints returning 200 with successful message delivery confirmed via logs
passed_tests: Admin login (/api/auth/login) - 200 OK with valid credentials
GET /api/settings - 200 OK, shows SMTP port 587 and Twilio config
WhatsApp with spaces in phone number (+91 9876 543 210) - 200 OK, spaces cleaned correctly

smtp_starttls_fix.issue: SMTP using SMTP_SSL (use_tls=True) on port 587 instead of STARTTLS
smtp_starttls_fix.fix: Now uses start_tls=True for port 587, use_tls=True for port 465

whatsapp_phone_format_fix.issue: Phone numbers with spaces/dashes caused E.164 format errors
whatsapp_phone_format_fix.fix: Phone numbers cleaned with .replace(' ', '').replace('-', '') before sending
whatsapp_phone_format_fix.status: VERIFIED - messages sent with both clean and spaced phone numbers

context_for_next_testing_agent: SMTP and WhatsApp bug fixes confirmed working. Twilio sandbox is configured with real credentials (Account SID starts with AC90629793). SMTP uses smtp2go.com on port 587 with STARTTLS.
